name: cefonicid
content: Cefonicide (or cefonicid) is a cephalosporin antibiotic. It has a density of 1.92g/cm3.   == Synthesis == Injectable semi-synthetic cephalosporin antibiotic related to cefamandole, q.v.  Cefonicid is synthesized conveniently by nucleophilic displacement of the 3-acetoxy moiety of 1 with the appropriately substituted tetrazole thiole 2. The mandelic acid amide C-7 side chain is reminiscent of cefamandole.   == See also == Cefazaflur   == References ==
